editions.effect: [Ciel Bonus] **On Attack**: If there are no cards in the attacker's intent, you may pay (X). **X** can't be more than the amount of omens you have. If you do, Lacuna's Grasp gets +**X**[POWER] %%until end of turn%.
editions.effect_raw: [Ciel Bonus] On Attack: If there are no cards in the attacker's intent, you may pay (X). X can't be more than the amount of omens you have. If you do, Lacuna's Grasp gets +XPOWER until end of turn.
editions.effect_html: Ciel Bonus On Attack: If there are no cards in the attacker's intent, you may pay X. X can't be more than the amount of omens you have. If you do, Lacuna's Grasp gets +X until end of turn.

name: Lacuna's Grasp

rule.description: Cards in banishment with omen counters on them are omens.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'gets +X power.' -> 'gets +X power until end of turn.'

effect_html: Ciel Bonus On Attack: If there are no cards in the attacker's intent, you may pay X. X can't be more than the amount of omens you have. If you do, Lacuna's Grasp gets +X.
